files.summary:
Employee Handbook
Employees are required to maintain confidentiality of internal data. All leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal. The organization shall review wage policies every financial year.

obligations.sentence:
Employee Handbook
Employees are required to maintain confidentiality of internal data.
All leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal.
The organization shall review wage policies every financial year.

files.summary:
Safety Policy
Every employee must wear safety equipment in designated zones. All safety training shall be completed by March 2025. Supervisors are required to ensure compliance with OSHA standards.

obligations.sentence:
Safety Policy
Every employee must wear safety equipment in designated zones.
All safety training shall be completed by March 2025.
Supervisors are required to ensure compliance with OSHA standards.
Accidents must be reported immediately to the safety committee.

files.summary:
Data Privacy Policy
This document outlines how the company complies with GDPR and CCPA rules. Employees shall ensure that personal information is deleted after the retention period. All data protection incidents must be reported to the compliance officer within 24 hours.

obligations.sentence: All personal data must be stored securely and processed lawfully.
Employees shall ensure that personal information is deleted after the retention period.
All data protection incidents must be reported to the compliance officer within 24 hours.

combined_checklist.sentence:
Employee Handbook
Employees are required to maintain confidentiality of internal data.
All leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal.
The organization shall review wage policies every financial year.

Safety Policy
Every employee must wear safety equipment in designated zones.
All safety training shall be completed by March 2025.
Supervisors are required to ensure compliance with OSHA standards.
Accidents must be reported immediately to the safety committee.
All personal data must be stored securely and processed lawfully.
Employees shall ensure that personal information is deleted after the retention period.
All data protection incidents must be reported to the compliance officer within 24 hours.
